name: Assent of the Eldritch Ones
description:
Assent of the Eldritch Ones is a visual novel, branching narrative game about a student's (the player) first week at Eikon Academy, an academy that specializes in teaching magic through service to Eldritch Beings.

The player will choose what to do during the first week, specifically where to go during breaks between classes. They will meet and possibly befriend other students, while trying to survive and discover more about this strange school. All of the choices the player makes during the week will determine which of the Three Eldritch Ones will give them a portion of Their power, granting them supernatural abilities.

The current PC build consists of Day 0, or Orientation Day. The full game will have 6 more days, including special routes and endings. The Mac build will be available soon.

Please leave any feedback in the comments below or by completing the online form linked at the end of the demo!
